affiliate-system.title: Affiliate System
affiliate-system.description: Affiliate system allows invitations and opportunities to earn credit in crypto for involved parties.

api/Auction/Auction Summary.title: Auction Summary
api/Auction/Auction Summary.description: The Auction type represents an auction round within the system, including details about the auction's timing, tokens, status, and associated avatars.

api/Auction/Check Rounds.title: Check Rounds
api/Auction/Check Rounds.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Auction/Create New Auction Round.title: Create New Auction Round
api/Auction/Create New Auction Round.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Auction/Get All Auction Rounds.title: Get All Auction Rounds
api/Auction/Get All Auction Rounds.description: The getAuctions query is used to retrieve all auction rounds available in the system.

api/Auction/Get Auction By Status.title: Get Auction By Status
api/Auction/Get Auction By Status.description: The getAuctionByStatus query is used to retrieve auction rounds based on their status.

api/Auction/Get Auction Round by Id.title: Get Auction Round by Id
api/Auction/Get Auction Round by Id.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Auction/Get Auction Round By Number.title: Get Auction Round By Number
api/Auction/Get Auction Round By Number.description: The getAuctionByNumber query is used to retrieve a specific auction round based on its round number.

api/Auction/Get Current Round.title: Get Current Round
api/Auction/Get Current Round.description: The getCurrentRound query is used to retrieve information about the current round, which could be an auction or presale. At any given time, there must be only one opened or countdown round. This query can be used to determine the appropriate landing page based on the round status.

api/Auction/Update Existing Auction Roun.title: Update Existing Auction Round
api/Auction/Update Existing Auction Roun.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Avatar/Avatar Summary.title: Avatar Summary
api/Avatar/Avatar Summary.description: The Avatar system includes various components and profiles to represent users' avatars. These include components (such as accessories), profiles (combinations of components), and avatar sets (groups of components).

api/Avatar/Create Avatar Component.title: Create Avatar Component
api/Avatar/Create Avatar Component.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Avatar/Create New Avatar Profile.title: Create New Avatar Profile
api/Avatar/Create New Avatar Profile.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Avatar/Get Avatar By ID.title: Get Avatar By ID
api/Avatar/Get Avatar By ID.description: The getAvatar query is used to retrieve the avatar profile based on the unique ID of the profile.

api/Avatar/Get Avatar By Name.title: Get Avatar By Name
api/Avatar/Get Avatar By Name.description: The getAvatarByName query is used to retrieve the avatar profile based on the unique surname of the profile.

api/Avatar/Get Avatar Components.title: Get Avatar Components
api/Avatar/Get Avatar Components.description: The getAvatarComponents query is used to retrieve all avatar components available in the system.

api/Avatar/Get Avatar Components By Sets.title: Get Avatar Components By Sets
api/Avatar/Get Avatar Components By Sets.description: The getAvatarComponentsBySet query is used to retrieve a list of avatar components based on a provided set of components. This query allows users to get the components associated with a specific avatar profile.

api/Avatar/Get Avatar Profiles.title: Get Avatar Profiles
api/Avatar/Get Avatar Profiles.description: The getAvatars query is used to retrieve all avatar profiles available in the system.

api/Avatar/Get Components By Group.title: Get Components By Group
api/Avatar/Get Components By Group.description: The getAvatarComponentsByGroup query is used to retrieve a list of avatar components based on a specific group ID. This query allows users to get all components associated with a particular group.

api/Avatar/Update Avatar Component.title: Update Avatar Component
api/Avatar/Update Avatar Component.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Avatar/Update Avatar Profile.title: Update Avatar Profile
api/Avatar/Update Avatar Profile.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Bid/Get Bid.title: Get Bid
api/Bid/Get Bid.description: The getBid query is used to retrieve the bid placed by the current user for a specific auction round.

api/Bid/Get Bid By Admin.title: Get Bid By Admin
api/Bid/Get Bid By Admin.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Bid/Get Bid List By Round ID.id: api/Bid/Get Bid List By Round ID
api/Bid/Get Bid List By Round ID.title: Get Bid List By Round ID
api/Bid/Get Bid List By Round ID.description: The getBidListById query is used to retrieve the list of bids for a specified auction round by its ID.

api/Bid/Get Bid List by Round Number.id: api/Bid/Get Bid List by Round Number
api/Bid/Get Bid List by Round Number.title: Get Bid List by Round Number
api/Bid/Get Bid List by Round Number.description: The getBidListByRound query is used to retrieve the list of bids that are placed and confirmed for a specific auction round.

api/Bid/Get Bid List By User.title: Get Bid List By User
api/Bid/Get Bid List By User.description: The getBidListByUser query is used to retrieve the list of bids placed by the current user for all auction rounds.

api/Bid/Increase an Existing Bid.title: Increase an Existing Bid
api/Bid/Increase an Existing Bid.description: The increaseBid mutation allows a user to increase the token price or token amount of an existing bid in a specified auction round.

api/Bid/Place a New Bid.title: Place a New Bid
api/Bid/Place a New Bid.description: The placeBid mutation allows a user to place a new bid in a specified auction round.

api/Deposit/Change Show Status.title: Change Show Status
api/Deposit/Change Show Status.description: These mutations allow a user to change the show status of different types of deposit transactions (PayPal, Stripe, Bank) to either hide or show them.

api/Deposit/Confirm Bank Deposit by Admi.title: Confirm Bank Deposit by Admin
api/Deposit/Confirm Bank Deposit by Admi.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Deposit/Confirm PayPal Checkout Orde.title: Confirm PayPal Checkout Order
api/Deposit/Confirm PayPal Checkout Orde.description: The captureOrderForDeposit mutation allows a user to confirm a PayPal payment for a deposit into their wallet. The backend will verify the payment and, if successful, add the balance to the user's internal wallet.

api/Deposit/Create Bank Deposit Request.title: Create Bank Deposit Request
api/Deposit/Create Bank Deposit Request.description: The bankForDeposit mutation allows a user to create an empty bank deposit transaction. This can be used to initiate a bank deposit request.

api/Deposit/Create Crypto Payment for De.id: api/Deposit/Create Crypto Payment for Deposit Into the Wallet
api/Deposit/Create Crypto Payment for De.title: Create Crypto Payment for Deposit Into the Wallet
api/Deposit/Create Crypto Payment for De.description: The createChargeForDeposit mutation allows a user to create a cryptocurrency payment for a deposit into their wallet. It returns a deposit transaction with a deposit address.

api/Deposit/Create PayPal Payment for De.id: api/Deposit/Create PayPal Payment for Deposit Into the Wallet
api/Deposit/Create PayPal Payment for De.title: Create PayPal Payment for Deposit Into the Wallet
api/Deposit/Create PayPal Payment for De.description: The paypalForDeposit mutation allows a user to create a PayPal payment for a deposit into their wallet. It returns an order response with details needed to proceed with the PayPal checkout.

api/Deposit/Create Stripe Payment for De.id: api/Deposit/Create Stripe Payment for Deposit Into the Wallet
api/Deposit/Create Stripe Payment for De.title: Create Stripe Payment for Deposit Into the Wallet
api/Deposit/Create Stripe Payment for De.description: The stripeForDeposit mutation allows a user to create a Stripe payment for a deposit into their wallet.

api/Deposit/Create Stripe payment with S.id: api/Deposit/Create Stripe payment with Saved Card for Deposit
api/Deposit/Create Stripe payment with S.title: Create Stripe payment with Saved Card for Deposit
api/Deposit/Create Stripe payment with S.description: The stripeForDepositWithSavedCard mutation allows a user to create a Stripe payment for a deposit into their wallet using a saved card.

api/Deposit/Viewing Deposit Transactions.title: Viewing Deposit Transactions
api/Deposit/Viewing Deposit Transactions.description: These queries allow users and admins to retrieve various types of deposit transactions. Below are the queries for PayPal, Bank, and Coinpayment deposit transactions.

api/Notification/Add New Notification Ty.title: Add New Notification Type
api/Notification/Add New Notification Ty.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Notification/Get All Notification Ty.title: Get All Notification Types
api/Notification/Get All Notification Ty.description: The getNotificationTypes query is used to retrieve the list of all available notification types in the system.

api/Notification/Get All Unread Notifica.title: Get All Unread Notifications
api/Notification/Get All Unread Notifica.description: The getAllUnReadNotifications query is used to retrieve the list of all unread notifications for the current user.

api/Notification/Get Notifications with.id: api/Notification/Get Notifications with Offset and Limit
api/Notification/Get Notifications with.title: Get Notifications with Offset and Limit
api/Notification/Get Notifications with.description: The getNotifications query is used to retrieve a paginated list of notifications for the current user.

api/Notification/Set Notification Read.title: Set Notification Read
api/Notification/Set Notification Read.description: The setNotificationReadFlag mutation allows a user to mark a notification as read.

api/Presale Orders/Get All Newly Placed.id: api/Presale Orders/Get All Newly Placed Orders In A Presale Round
api/Presale Orders/Get All Newly Placed.title: Get All Newly Placed Orders In A Presale Round
api/Presale Orders/Get All Newly Placed.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Presale Orders/Get All Presale Order.id: api/Presale Orders/Get All Presale Orders In A Specific Presale Round
api/Presale Orders/Get All Presale Order.title: Get All Presale Orders In A Specific Presale Round
api/Presale Orders/Get All Presale Order.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Presale Orders/Get Presale Order By.id: api/Presale Orders/Get Presale Order By ID
api/Presale Orders/Get Presale Order By.title: Get Presale Order By ID
api/Presale Orders/Get Presale Order By.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Presale Orders/Get Presale Order Tra.title: Get Presale Order Transactions
api/Presale Orders/Get Presale Order Tra.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Presale Orders/Get Presale Orders By.id: api/Presale Orders/Get Presale Orders By User
api/Presale Orders/Get Presale Orders By.title: Get Presale Orders By User
api/Presale Orders/Get Presale Orders By.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Presale Orders/Place A New Presale O.id: api/Presale Orders/Place A New Presale Order
api/Presale Orders/Place A New Presale O.title: Place A New Presale Order
api/Presale Orders/Place A New Presale O.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Presale Payment/Adding New Coin.title: Adding New Coin
api/Presale Payment/Adding New Coin.description: The addNewCoin mutation allows an admin to add a new cryptocurrency to the system.

api/Presale Payment/Capture Paypal Order.id: api/Presale Payment/Capture Paypal Order For Presale
api/Presale Payment/Capture Paypal Order.title: Capture Paypal Order For Presale
api/Presale Payment/Capture Paypal Order.description: The captureOrderForPresale mutation allows a user to confirm a PayPal payment for a presale order. The backend will verify the payment and update the presale order status accordingly.

api/Presale Payment/Get Coins.title: Get Coins
api/Presale Payment/Get Coins.description: The getCoins query is used to retrieve the list of all available cryptocurrencies in the system.

api/Presale Payment/Get Crypto Transacti.id: api/Presale Payment/Get Crypto Transactions for Presale Orders
api/Presale Payment/Get Crypto Transacti.title: Get Crypto Transactions for Presale Orders
api/Presale Payment/Get Crypto Transacti.description: The getCryptoTransactions query is used to retrieve all cryptocurrency transactions for presale orders.

api/Presale Payment/Get Cryptocurrency P.title: Get Cryptocurrency Price
api/Presale Payment/Get Cryptocurrency P.description: The getCryptoPrice query is used to retrieve the current price of a specified cryptocurrency.

api/Presale Payment/Get PayPal Transacti.id: api/Presale Payment/Get PayPal Transactions for Presale Orders
api/Presale Payment/Get PayPal Transacti.title: Get PayPal Transactions for Presale Orders
api/Presale Payment/Get PayPal Transacti.description: The getPayPalTransactions query is used to retrieve all PayPal transactions for presale orders.

api/Presale Payment/Get Stripe Transacti.id: api/Presale Payment/Get Stripe Transaction for Presale Orders
api/Presale Payment/Get Stripe Transacti.title: Get Stripe Transaction for Presale Orders
api/Presale Payment/Get Stripe Transacti.description: The getStripeTransactions query is used to retrieve all Stripe transactions for presale orders.

api/Presale Payment/Pay For Presale In C.id: api/Presale Payment/Pay For Presale In Crypto Currency
api/Presale Payment/Pay For Presale In C.title: Pay For Presale In Crypto Currency
api/Presale Payment/Pay For Presale In C.description: The createChargeForPresale mutation allows a user to create a cryptocurrency payment for a presale order. It returns the deposit address for the payment.

api/Presale Payment/Pay For Presale Orde.id: api/Presale Payment/Pay For Presale Order With Nyyu Wallet
api/Presale Payment/Pay For Presale Orde.title: Pay For Presale Order With Nyyu Wallet
api/Presale Payment/Pay For Presale Orde.description: The payWalletForPresale mutation allows a user to pay for a presale order using their Nyyu wallet balance.

api/Presale Payment/Pay for presale with.id: api/Presale Payment/Pay for presale with PayPal
api/Presale Payment/Pay for presale with.title: Pay for presale with PayPal
api/Presale Payment/Pay for presale with.description: The paypalForPresale mutation allows a user to create a PayPal checkout order for a presale order. The frontend (FE) will be redirected to the PayPal checkout page.

api/Presale Payment/Pay for presale with.id: api/Presale Payment/Pay for presale with Stripe
api/Presale Payment/Pay for presale with.title: Pay for presale with Stripe
api/Presale Payment/Pay for presale with.description: The payStripeForPreSale mutation allows a user to pay for a presale order using Stripe. Please refer to the Stripe API documentation for details on paymentIntentId and paymentMethodId.

api/Presale Payment/Pay For Presale with.id: api/Presale Payment/Pay For Presale with Stripe Saved Card
api/Presale Payment/Pay For Presale with.title: Pay For Presale with Stripe Saved Card
api/Presale Payment/Pay For Presale with.description: The payStripeForPreSaleWithSavedCard mutation allows a user to pay for a presale order using a saved card with Stripe.

api/Presale Payment/Place a New Presale.id: api/Presale Payment/Place a New Presale Order
api/Presale Payment/Place a New Presale.title: Place a New Presale Order
api/Presale Payment/Place a New Presale.description: The placePreSaleOrder mutation allows a user to place a new presale order with specified details.

api/Presale/Create New Presale.title: Create New Presale
api/Presale/Create New Presale.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Presale/Get Presales.title: Get Presales
api/Presale/Get Presales.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Presale/Get Presales by Status.title: Get Presales by Status
api/Presale/Get Presales by Status.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Profile/Set Avatar.title: Set Avatar
api/Profile/Set Avatar.description: The setAvatar mutation allows a user to set an avatar when creating a new account after setting 2FA.

api/Registration/Confirm 2FA Setting.title: Confirm 2FA Setting
api/Registration/Confirm 2FA Setting.description: The confirmRequest2FA mutation is used to confirm the setup of two-factor authentication (2FA) for a user account. This step verifies that the 2FA method selected by the user is properly configured.

api/Registration/Disable 2FA.title: Disable 2FA
api/Registration/Disable 2FA.description: The disable2FA mutation is used to disable a specified two-factor authentication (2FA) method for the user. This allows users to manage their 2FA settings by removing methods they no longer wish to use.

api/Registration/Forgot Password.title: Forgot Password
api/Registration/Forgot Password.description: The forgotPassword mutation is used to initiate the password reset process for a user. It verifies the user's email and sends a reset code to the specified email address.

api/Registration/Password Reset.title: Password Reset
api/Registration/Password Reset.description: The resetPassword mutation is used to reset a user's password using a reset code sent to their email. This process ensures that only the user with access to the registered email can change the password.

api/Registration/Request 2FA.title: Request 2FA
api/Registration/Request 2FA.description: The request2FA mutation is used to request two-factor authentication (2FA) for a registered and verified account. The user can choose from various methods such as Google Authentication app, email code, or SMS code.

api/Registration/Resend Verification Cod.title: Resend Verification Code
api/Registration/Resend Verification Cod.description: The resendVerifyCode mutation is used to resend the verification code to the user's email address. This can be helpful if the user did not receive the initial verification code or if the code has expired.

api/Registration/Sign in.title: Sign in
api/Registration/Sign in.description: The signin mutation is used to authenticate a user using their email and password. If the account is verified and 2FA is set up, the appropriate 2FA code will be sent.

api/Registration/Sign in 2FA Check.title: Sign in 2FA Check
api/Registration/Sign in 2FA Check.description: The confirm2FA mutation is used to confirm the second factor of authentication for a user who has successfully completed the initial sign-in stage. This step verifies the 2FA code provided by the user.

api/Registration/Sign up.title: Sign up
api/Registration/Sign up.description: The signup mutation allows a new user to register an account. The process involves providing an email address, password, and country code. Depending on the current status of the email in the system, different responses will be returned.

api/Registration/Verify Account.title: Verify Account
api/Registration/Verify Account.description: The verifyAccount mutation is used to verify a user's email address using a code sent to the email. This is a crucial step in the user registration process to ensure the email address is valid and belongs to the user.

api/Social Login - OAuth2/Add & Update S.id: api/Social Login - OAuth2/Add & Update Social Sites into DB
api/Social Login - OAuth2/Add & Update S.title: Add & Update Social Sites into DB
api/Social Login - OAuth2/Add & Update S.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Social Login - OAuth2/OAuth2 Summary.title: OAuth2 Summary
api/Social Login - OAuth2/OAuth2 Summary.description: The OAuth2Registration type represents the configuration for OAuth2 social login providers. This is used to handle OAuth2 authentication with various providers.

api/Social Login - OAuth2/Send Request f.id: api/Social Login - OAuth2/Send Request for Social login
api/Social Login - OAuth2/Send Request f.title: Send Request for Social login
api/Social Login - OAuth2/Send Request f.description: To initiate a social login request, construct the authorization URL using the base API URL, OAuth2 provider, and redirect URI. This URL will direct the user to the OAuth2 provider's authorization page.

api/Statistics/Get Round Chance.title: Get Round Chance
api/Statistics/Get Round Chance.description: The getRoundChance query is used to retrieve the winning and failing rates for all rounds.

api/Statistics/Get Round Perform 1.title: Get Round Perform 1
api/Statistics/Get Round Perform 1.description: The getRoundPerform1 query is used to retrieve performance metrics for all rounds, including token price and sold amount.

api/Statistics/Get Round Perform 2.title: Get Round Perform 2
api/Statistics/Get Round Perform 2.description: The getRoundPerform2 query is used to retrieve additional performance metrics for all rounds, including minimum value, maximum value, and standard deviation.

api/User Tier/Add New Task Setting.title: Add New Task Setting
api/User Tier/Add New Task Setting.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User Tier/Add New Tier.title: Add New Tier
api/User Tier/Add New Tier.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User Tier/Delete User Tier.title: Delete User Tier
api/User Tier/Delete User Tier.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User Tier/Get User Tiers.title: Get User Tiers
api/User Tier/Get User Tiers.description: The getUserTiers query is used to retrieve the list of all user tiers available in the system.

api/User Tier/Update Task Setting.title: Update Task Setting
api/User Tier/Update Task Setting.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User Tier/Update User Tier.title: Update User Tier
api/User Tier/Update User Tier.description: The updateUserTier mutation allows an admin to update the details of an existing user tier level.

api/User/Add Disallowed Country.title: Add Disallowed Country
api/User/Add Disallowed Country.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User/Change Password by User.title: Change Password by User
api/User/Change Password by User.description: The changePassword mutation allows a user to change their password.

api/User/Change Role.title: Change Role
api/User/Change Role.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User/Confirm Email Change.title: Confirm Email Change
api/User/Confirm Email Change.description: The confirmEmailChange mutation is used to confirm a change of the user's email address. After receiving a verification code from the backend, this mutation finalizes the email change request.

api/User/Create New User By Admin.title: Create New User By Admin
api/User/Create New User By Admin.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User/Delete Account.title: Delete Account
api/User/Delete Account.description: The deleteAccount mutation allows a user to delete their own account. Admins can also use this mutation to delete any user account.

api/User/Get Paginated Users.title: Get Paginated Users
api/User/Get Paginated Users.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User/Get User.title: Get User
api/User/Get User.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User/Get User by ID.title: Get User by ID
api/User/Get User by ID.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User/Get Users Count.title: Get Users Count
api/User/Get Users Count.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User/Make Allow Location.title: Make Allow Location
api/User/Make Allow Location.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User/Release User by Admin.title: Release User by Admin
api/User/Release User by Admin.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User/Request Email Change.title: Request Email Change
api/User/Request Email Change.description: The requestEmailChange mutation allows a user to request a change of their email address. After the request is made, a verification code will be sent to the current email address for confirmation.

api/User/Reset Password By Admin.title: Reset Password By Admin
api/User/Reset Password By Admin.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User/Suspend User by Admin.title: Suspend User by Admin
api/User/Suspend User by Admin.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/User/User Summary.title: User Summary
api/User/User Summary.description: The User type represents a user in the system, including details such as registration date, email, name, role, and various verification statuses.

api/Withdraw/Approve Fiat Withdrawal Req.title: Approve Fiat Withdrawal Request
api/Withdraw/Approve Fiat Withdrawal Req.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Withdraw/Change Withdrawal Request S.title: Change Withdrawal Request Show Status
api/Withdraw/Change Withdrawal Request S.description: These mutations allow a user to change the show status of different types of withdrawal transactions (PayPal, Crypto, Bank) to either hide or show them on the wallet page.

api/Withdraw/Confirm PayPal Withdrawal R.title: Confirm PayPal Withdrawal Request
api/Withdraw/Confirm PayPal Withdrawal R.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

api/Withdraw/Crypto Withdrawal Request.title: Crypto Withdrawal Request
api/Withdraw/Crypto Withdrawal Request.description: The cryptoWithdrawRequest mutation allows a user to request a withdrawal of cryptocurrency assets. This mutation sends a request to the admin to process the withdrawal. It does not create a real payout request but is used to notify the admin of the user's withdrawal request.

api/Withdraw/Deny Bank Withdrawal Reques.title: Deny Bank Withdrawal Request
api/Withdraw/Deny Bank Withdrawal Reques.description: The denyBankWithdrawRequest mutation allows an admin to deny a bank withdrawal request. The admin can provide a reason for the denial.

api/Withdraw/Fiat Withdrawal Request.title: Fiat Withdrawal Request
api/Withdraw/Fiat Withdrawal Request.description: The bankWithdrawRequest mutation allows a user to request a withdrawal of assets via bank transfer. This mutation sends a request to the admin to process the withdrawal. It does not create a real payout request but is used to notify the admin of the user's withdrawal request.

api/Withdraw/Generate Withdraw Code.title: Generate Withdraw Code
api/Withdraw/Generate Withdraw Code.description: The generateWithdraw mutation allows a user to generate a verification code for withdrawing assets. When a user initiates a withdrawal, this mutation sends an email with a verification code to the user. This code is required for all types of withdrawal requests.

api/Withdraw/PayPal Withdraw Request.title: PayPal Withdraw Request
api/Withdraw/PayPal Withdraw Request.description: The paypalWithdrawRequest mutation allows a user to request a withdrawal of assets via PayPal. This mutation sends a request to the admin to process the withdrawal. It does not create a real payout request but is used to notify the admin of the user's withdrawal request.

api/Withdraw/Send Withdraw Confirmation.title: Send Withdraw Confirmation Code
api/Withdraw/Send Withdraw Confirmation.description: The functions described is accessible only to users with ADMIN privileges.

troubleshoot/Startups/invest-startups.title: How can I invest in startups on NYYU?
troubleshoot/Startups/invest-startups.description: Investing in startups on NYYU is a simple process. Start by logging into our platform and browsing the diverse range of startup opportunities available. Each startup listing provides comprehensive details, including industry insights, growth projections, and investment terms. Once you've identified a startup that resonates with your investment strategy, you can proceed to invest directly through your NYYU wallet. Our intuitive platform streamlines the investment process, empowering you to seize opportunities and fuel innovation with confidence.

troubleshoot/Startups/investment-risks.title: What are the potential risks associated with investing in startups on NYYU?
troubleshoot/Startups/investment-risks.description: Investing in startups through NYYU offers growth potential alongside inherent risks. We diligently mitigate these risks by implementing robust measures throughout the investment process. Despite the high volatility typical in startup investments due to market dynamics and technological advancements, our platform provides diversified opportunities while effectively managing risk exposure.

troubleshoot/Startups/minimum-investment.title: Are there any minimum investment requirements for startups on NYYU?
troubleshoot/Startups/minimum-investment.description: Minimum investment requirements for startups on NYYU can vary based on the project. While some startups may have specific minimum investment thresholds in place, others may offer more flexible investment options. We advise reviewing the investment details for each startup opportunity to understand any minimum investment requirements and ensure that your investment fits within your investment strategy and budget.

troubleshoot/Startups/track-performance.title: Can I track the performance of my startup investments on NYYU?
troubleshoot/Startups/track-performance.description: Yes, you can track the performance of your startup investments on NYYU. While updates are provided annually, our platform offers tools and features that enable you to monitor the progress and performance of your investments throughout the year. You'll have access to comprehensive reports and analytics, allowing you to assess the growth and financial health of your portfolio. While updates may be less frequent, our platform aims to provide you with the necessary insights to make informed decisions about your investments.

troubleshoot/Startups/vetting-startups.title: What is the process for vetting and selecting startups on NYYU?
troubleshoot/Startups/vetting-startups.description: The process for vetting and selecting new ventures on NYYU involves several key steps to ensure the quality and integrity of the investment avenues. Firstly, virtually every type of startup is considered for listing on the platform, except for those involved in unethical industries such as military applications or pornography. Regarding vetting procedures, several steps are undertaken.

troubleshoot/Trading/trade-commodities.title: Can I trade physical commodities or only futures contracts?
troubleshoot/Trading/trade-commodities.description: At NYYU, we offer a diverse range of commodities for trading, including both physical commodities and futures contracts. Investors can choose the approach that fits their preferences and risk tolerance, providing flexibility in their investment strategies.

tutorial-basics/auction-launchpad.title: Auction and Launchpad Platform
tutorial-basics/auction-launchpad.description: Auction and launchpad platform, serving digital auctions or incubators for crypto companies.

tutorial-basics/dex.title: Decentralized Exchange (DEX)
tutorial-basics/dex.description: A decentralized exchange (DEX) allows for trading cryptocurrencies and tokens without an intermediary.

tutorial-basics/earn-rewards.title: Earn Crypto Rewards
tutorial-basics/earn-rewards.description: Earn crypto rewards by purchasing any item in the store with your NYYU card. The NYYU Card also will have the advantages of being extremely quick to set up, simple to use, and has no annual fee.

tutorial-basics/emi.title: EMI - Electronic Money Institution
tutorial-basics/emi.description: EMI or electronic money institution allows offline/online payments. EMI allows individual IBANs and sub-accounts. EMI will cover the EU and provide SWIFT and SEPA services. We intend to obtain the license in the EU and Australia.

tutorial-basics/Marketplace/mart.title: Mart - Digital Marketplace
tutorial-basics/Marketplace/mart.description: Mart is a digital marketplace for traditional and digital assets including real estate, crypto, commodities, NFT, and Startups.

tutorial-basics/mobile.title: Mobile - Trading on the Go
tutorial-basics/mobile.description: Mobile allows trading, saving, and custody of cryptocurrency on the move. The NYYU Mobile app gives access to the crypto exchange and wallet.

tutorial-basics/node-support.title: Node Support
tutorial-basics/node-support.description: Node supports Watt, BTC, ETH, BSC, Tron, and Solana chains. Node API is a commercial service for payment providers.

tutorial-basics/pay.title: Pay - Payment Gateway Service
tutorial-basics/pay.description: Pay is a payment gateway service that enables users to accept digital payments and immediately receive fiat currency in exchange. Pay is one of the payment gateways that offers high security against price volatility due to its crypto-to-fiat payment conversion.

tutorial-basics/proof-of-reserves.title: Proof of Reserves
tutorial-basics/proof-of-reserves.description: Proof of Reserves captures exchange-owned assets, such as crypto holdings and fiat cash, at a specific time.

tutorial-basics/sale-launchpad.title: Sale and Launchpad Platform
tutorial-basics/sale-launchpad.description: Sale and launchpad platform, serving for digital sale or incubators for crypto companies.

tutorial-basics/save.title: Save - Earn Interest on Savings
tutorial-basics/save.description: Save allows users to earn interest on their savings. There are also flexible withdrawal and deposit terms available.

tutorial-basics/stablecoin.title: Stablecoin - NUSD
tutorial-basics/stablecoin.description: The 1:1 USD-backed stablecoin built by a secure, reliable, and regulated cryptocurrency exchange. We intend to create a stablecoin  NUSD allowing users to transact on a decentralized exchange, earn interest and provide liquidity, and many more.

tutorial-basics/uni.title: UNI - Unified Financial Data
tutorial-basics/uni.description: UNI provides or integrates third-party financial data and payments in one platform.

tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.title: Manage Docs Versions
tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.description: Docusaurus can manage multiple versions of your docs.
